# symbolic

**Type Property**

The symbolic font traits.

## Declaration

```swift
static let symbolic: UIFontDescriptor.TraitKey
```

## Discussion

Use this key with a trait dictionary to get the symbolic traits value as an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object.

## Font traits

- **slant**: The relative slant angle of the font.
- **weight**: The numerical value that corresponds to a font face.
- **width**: The inter-glyph spacing of the font.

items.description: The relative slant angle of the font.
